answers.answer: When i was urinating, always thirsty, always hungry and always tired, I found out that I have type one diabetes. However, you could possibly have a UTI. You should really talk to your doctor because if you have diabetes you can have serious health complications if it is left untreated. Hope this helps!

question: hi i recently had a baby 7 months ago i did have cholestasis ut was fine after giveing birth and feel so tired thirsty all the time and urinateing alot i also have hot flushes and really bad headaches do you know what this could be i did think diabeties
title: headaches hot flushes tiredness thirsty and urinateing alot
